text: @realDonaldTrump You and your administration brought covid-19 infected people back to the states, then sent in an untrained, not properly clothed federal team in as a welcome party. Those people then left freely, now contaminated, spreading the germs EVERYWHERE!!!!! THIS IS YOUR FAULT!!!!
